attributes.action: Allow Tax Payers To Opt Out Of Certain Taxes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Allow Tax Payers To Opt Out Of Certain Taxes.
ie: No children, No tax for schools.
Full private health insurance, No tax for the NHS.
No tax to immigration.
No tax to Scotland.
etc etc. 
Lets have a tick sheet for everyone.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
